name: Nilou | Genshin Impact | LoRA
description:
A LoRA Model of Nilou from Genshin Impact.

This LoRA just includes one official costume.

There is one set of trigger words:

For triggering neither flower nor mist(Default Costumes):

nilou (neither flower nor mist) (genshin impact), aqua eyes, nilou (genshin impact), fake horns, red hair, long hair, crop top, jewelry, horns, veil, bracer, brooch, long sleeves, puffy long sleeves, skirt, bangs, twintails, puffy sleeves, neck ring, gold trim, parted bangs, arm up, circlet, blue skirt, hair ornament, detached sleeves, low twintails, floating hair, gem, hair flower, blue gemstone, dancer, white headwear, medium breasts, midriff, very long hair

bonus: For trigger Any Custom Outfit:

nilou (genshin impact), long hair, bangs, red hair, parted bangs, twintails, nail polish, aqua eyes, very long hair, low twintails, breasts, [Explain in detail what clouthes you would like to trigger......]

(I spent a long time figuring out how to remove the fake horns on her head......)

Recommend 0.85-1 Strength for triggering any official costume.

For changing custom clothes, I suggest 0.7-0.9 Weight

(If used with any Realistic style Checkpoint(e.g. ChilloutMix), I suggest 1.0-1.4 Weight)

The preview images were generated by the AbyssOrangeMix series Model.

I am using the NAI model [e6e8e1fc] to train.

Able to work with all mixed models based on NAI(i.e. AbyssOrangeMix, Anything v3, ChilloutMix)

If you like this LORA, please comment and give it a like.❤️

Any suggestions are welcome to comment here.

And also welcome to share your creations.

Enjoy it!
